issue.message: Call requires API level 33 (current min is 23): `launchChangeAppLanguageIntent`
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from org.fossify.commons.asynctasks.CopyMoveTask)
Attribute `appCategory` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 23)
Attribute `localeConfig` is only used in API level 33 and higher (current min is 23)
Attribute `min` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 23)
Missing URL
The application should not provide its own launch screen
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.android than 1.9.0 is available: 1.9.25
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.android than 1.9.0 is available: 1.9.25
A newer version of org.jetbrains.kotlin.android than 1.9.0 is available: 1.9.25

issue.message: "clear" is not translated in "hi" (Hindi), "lv" (Latvian), "mk" (Macedonian), "ms" (Malay), "en" (English), "is" (Icelandic), "my" (Burmese), "ne" (Nepali), "nn" (Norwegian Nynorsk), "bn" (Bangla), "br" (Breton), "bs" (Bosnian), "si" (Sinhala), "zgh" (Standard Moroccan Tamazight), "ltg", "kn" (Kannada), "or" (Odia), "kr" (Kanuri), "sat" (Santali), "ta" (Tamil), "cr" (Cree), "te" (Telugu), "th" (Thai), "ckb"

"change_background_color" is not translated in "hi" (Hindi), "lv" (Latvian), "mk" (Macedonian), "ms" (Malay), "en" (English), "is" (Icelandic), "my" (Burmese), "ne" (Nepali), "nn" (Norwegian Nynorsk), "bn" (Bangla), "br" (Breton), "bs" (Bosnian), "si" (Sinhala), "zgh" (Standard Moroccan Tamazight), "ltg", "kn" (Kannada), "or" (Odia), "kr" (Kanuri), "sat" (Santali), "ta" (Tamil), "cr" (Cree), "te" (Telugu), "th" (Thai), "ckb"
The resource `R.string.package_name` appears to be unused
Prefer "`ifRoom`" instead of "`always`"
`onTouch` lambda should call `View#performClick` when a click is detected
Custom view `MyCanvas` overrides `onTouchEvent` but not `performClick`
Missing `contentDescription` attribute on image
